body.p: 1. Levite who assisted Kore, the son of Imnah, with the distribution of the “contribution reserved for the Lord” among the priests in the cities of Judah (2 Chr 31:14-15).
2. Head of a priestly house during the postexilic era (Neh 12:17). He was also called “Mijamin” (12:5).
3. Participant in the dedication of the Jerusalem wall (Neh 12:41).
